subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: David Stern, the N.B.A. commissioner, is expected to hold a news conference this week to discuss the league’s involvement in the F.B.I.’s gambling investigation of the referee Tim Donaghy.
snippet: David Stern, the N.B.A. commissioner, is expected to hold a news conference this week to discuss the league’s involvement in the F.B.I.’s gambling investigation of the referee Tim Donaghy.
